Shiny vizsurvey from a R data.frame

Source: R/appComplete.R
runVizsurvey_from_r.Rd

Shiny vizsurvey from a R data.frame

Usage

runVizsurvey_from_r(
  df,
  var_itw,
  vars_discretes = NULL,
  vars_continous = NULL,
  var_domain = NULL,
  var_group = NULL
)

Arguments

df

data.frame

var_itw

name of interviewer variable

vars_discretes

(optional) preset of discretes variables

vars_continous

(optional) preset of continous variables

var_domain

(optional) name of domain variable

var_group

(optional) name of group variable

Value

shinyapp

Examples

library(laeken)
library(tidyverse)
#> Error in library(tidyverse): there is no package called ‘tidyverse’
data(eusilc)
set.seed(123)
eusilc <- eusilc %>%
  mutate(NR_ITW = paste(db040,sample(1:5,nrow(.), replace = T),sep="-"))
#> Error in eusilc %>% mutate(NR_ITW = paste(db040, sample(1:5, nrow(.),     replace = T), sep = "-")): could not find function "%>%"
if (FALSE) runVizsurvey_from_r(eusilc,var_itw = "NR_ITW",var_group = "db040") # \dontrun{}
